<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157877</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Characteristics of learning objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eigenschaften der erlernennachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques des objets d'étude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características de objetos de aprendizagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche degli oggetti imparanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά της εκμάθησης των αντικειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de objetos que aprenden</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site describes defines and characterizes learning objects.
The site links to articles on the subject of learning objects as well as to a few repositories of learning objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning module</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site beschreibt definiert und kennzeichnet 
erlernenobjects.The Site-Links zu den Artikeln bezüglich der 
erlernennachrichten sowie zu einigen Behältern der 
erlernennachrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site décrit définit et caractérise des liens
d'étude de site d'objects.The aux articles au sujet des objets 
d'étude aussi bien qu'à quelques dépôts des objets d'étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local descreve define e caracteriza as 
ligações de aprendizagem do local de objects.The aos artigos no 
assunto de objetos de aprendizagem as.well.as a alguns repositórios 
de objetos de aprendizagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo descrive definisce e caratterizza i 
collegamenti imparanti del luogo di objects.The agli articoli a 
proposito degli oggetti imparanti così come ad alcuni depositi degli 
oggetti imparanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιγράφει καθορίζει και χαρακτηρίζει 
την εκμάθηση αντιτίθεται Οι συνδέσεις περιοχών με τα άρθρα 
σχετικά με το θέμα της εκμάθησης των αντικειμένων καθώς επίσης 
και με μερικές αποθήκες της εκμάθησης αντιτίθενται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio describe define y caracteriza 
conexiones del sitio de objects.The que aprenden a los artículos a 
propósito de objetos que aprenden así como a algunos depósitos de 
objetos que aprenden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenmodul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenumgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernennachricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">module d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objet d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">módulo de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
